page.title: 14RHU PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: The responsibility for the provision of education in our area rests with Strathclyde Regional Council and is administered by Dumbarton Division through the Executive Officer Mr.J. Mulgrew.Rhu Primary School has grown from being a small country school to having a present roll of 169 with 6 full_time teachers,a flexibility teacher and the Headteacher,Mrs.Welsh. The children sit either in social or ability groups and work at their own level.Work covers a wide range of topics and where possible we utilise the local environment to enhance classroom learning.During the school year there is a considerable amount of change in pupils as we have families, many of whom are related to the nearby Naval Base,that move frequently_only 42% of present pupils have been in this school since Primary one.
